spell_tooltip.description:
Inner Light: Healing spells cost 10% less mana.

Inner Shadow: Spell damage and Atonement healing increased by 10%.

Activate to swap from one effect to the other, incurring a 6 sec cooldown.
When your Psychic Scream affects 1 or more players, the next crowd control effect against you is prevented. Lasts 15 sec.

Step into the shadows when you cast Fade, avoiding all attacks and spells for 1 sec.

Interrupt effects are not affected by Phase Shift.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Blast the target's mind for 11,726 Shadow damage. Costs a high amount of mana.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.
Increases your Intellect by 3%.
Lets out a psychic scream, causing all enemies within 8 yards to flee, disorienting them for 8 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost 50% less mana. Stacks to 2.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.

Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. 

If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.
Increases your Stamina by 6%.
Controls a mind up to 1 level above yours for 30 sec. Does not work versus Demonic, Undead, or Mechanical beings. Shares diminishing returns with other disorienting effects.
Surge of Light occurs up to 50% more often based on your missing mana.
Increases the damage and healing of your Holy and Shadow spells by 2%.
Increases your haste by 3%.
Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 5% for 15 sec after a critical heal with Flash Heal or Penance.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 1,765 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 250% to targets below 20% health.
Mind Blast tears open an Entropic Rift that follows the enemy for 8 sec. Enemies caught in its path suffer 584 Shadow damage every 0.4 sec while within its reach.
Increases maximum health by 25% for 10 sec, and instantly heals you for that amount.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
Fade out, removing all your threat and reducing enemies' detection range against you for 10 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Desperate Prayer by 20 sec.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 10%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Activating Fade removes all snare effects.
Increases the healing of your spells by 3%.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.

Power Word: Shield, Flash Heal, Plea, Penance, and Power Word: Radiance apply Atonement to your target for 15 sec.

Your spell damage heals all targets affected by Atonement for 35% of the damage done. Healing is reduced when healing more than 5 targets.
A burst of light heals the target and 4 injured allies within 40 yards for 4,114, and applies Atonement for 60% of its normal duration.
Reduces all damage taken by a friendly target by 40% for 8 sec. Castable while stunned.
Shadow Word: Pain has a chance to empower your next Penance with Shadow, increasing its effectiveness by 30%.
Power Word: Radiance gains an additional charge.
Smite prevents the next 1,384 damage dealt by the enemy.

Pain Suppression gains an additional charge.

Power Word: Shield reduces the cooldown of Pain Suppression by 3 sec.
Mind Blast has a 100% chance to grant Power of the Dark Side and deals 20% additional damage.
Shadow Word: Pain Spreads to 2 nearby enemies when you cast Penance on the target.
When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed, you restore 0.5% of your maximum mana.

Ascend into the air and unleash a massive barrage of Penance bolts, causing 64,714 Holy damage to enemies or 96,438 healing to allies over 4.1 sec.

While ascended, gain a shield for 100% of your health. In addition, you are unaffected by knockbacks or crowd control effects.
Each successive Penance bolt during a channel deals 5% increased damage and healing.
Atonement reduces damage taken by 2%.
Mind Blast deals 150% increased damage, but costs 40% more mana.
Penance fires one additional bolt of holy light over its duration.
Shadow damage and healing done increased by 15%.
Power Word: Radiance causes your next Penance to fire 2 additional bolts, stacking up to 2 charges.
Immediately Power Word: Radiance your target at 150% effectiveness, and causes your next 2 casts of Power Word: Radiance to be instant cast with 40% reduced mana cost.
Smite extends the duration of an active Atonement by 2.0 sec.
Flash Heal, Power Word: Shield, Penance, and Power Word: Radiance have a 20% increased chance to critically heal.
Evangelism increases your healing and absorption effects by 15% for 18 sec.

Shadow Word: Pain damage has a chance to upgrade your next Flash Heal to Shadow Mend.

 Shadow Mend:
Wraps an ally in shadows which heal for 21,581, but at a price.

The ally will take 1,037 damage every 1 sec, until they have taken 10,424 total damage from all sources, or leave combat.
Direct critical heals create a protective shield on the target, absorbing 30% of the amount healed. Lasts 15 sec.
Casting Power Word: Shield increases your Haste by 10% for 4 sec.
The damage of Smite and Penance is increased by 15%, and Penance increases or decreases your target's movement speed by 50% for 2 sec.
Power Word: Shield absorbs 20% additional damage and lasts 5 sec longer.

Your Penance bolts increase the absorb of your next Power Word: Shield by 3%.

Stacks up to 10 times.

Power Word: Shield absorbs 30% additional damage.

All damage dealt by Penance, Smite and Holy Nova increased by 15%.
Increases the duration of Atonement by 4 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Power Word: Shield by 1.5 sec.

Power Word: Shield casts apply 4 stacks of Prayer of Mending to your target.

 Prayer of Mending
Places a ward on an ally that heals them for 564 the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 4 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.

Your Angelic Feathers increase movement speed by an additional 10%.

When an ally walks through your Angelic Feather, you are also granted 100% of its effect.
Pain Suppression reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.
Your Flash Heal and Power Word: Shield are 30% more effective when cast on yourself.
The first bolt of each Penance cast damages or heals for 125% more.
15% of overhealing done is redistributed to up to 4 nearby injured allies.
3 additional Penance bolts are fired at an enemy within 46 yards when healing an ally with Penance, or fired at an ally within 46 yards when damaging an enemy with Penance.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Blast the target's mind for 12,005 Shadow damage. Costs a high amount of mana.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.
Increases your Intellect by 3%.
Lets out a psychic scream, causing all enemies within 8 yards to flee, disorienting them for 8 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Increases the damage of Shadow Word: Pain by 10%.
Increases the amount of damage required to break your Psychic Scream by 25%.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost 50% less mana. Stacks to 2.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. 

If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.
Controls a mind up to 1 level above yours for 30 sec. Does not work versus Demonic, Undead, or Mechanical beings. Shares diminishing returns with other disorienting effects.
Reduces the cooldown of Psychic Scream by 10 sec.
Surge of Light occurs up to 50% more often based on your missing mana.
Increases the damage and healing of your Holy and Shadow spells by 2%.
Increases your haste by 3%.
20% of Flash Heal healing on other targets also heals you.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 1,770 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 250% to targets below 20% health.
Mind Blast tears open an Entropic Rift that follows the enemy for 8 sec. Enemies caught in its path suffer 582 Shadow damage every 0.4 sec while within its reach.
Increases maximum health by 25% for 10 sec, and instantly heals you for that amount.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
Fade out, removing all your threat and reducing enemies' detection range against you for 10 sec.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal and Smite are reduced by 10%.
Activating Fade removes all snare effects.
When an attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 25% of your maximum health for 20 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.

Power Word: Shield, Flash Heal, Plea, Penance, and Power Word: Radiance apply Atonement to your target for 15 sec.

Your spell damage heals all targets affected by Atonement for 35% of the damage done. Healing is reduced when healing more than 5 targets.
A burst of light heals the target and 4 injured allies within 40 yards for 4,168, and applies Atonement for 60% of its normal duration.
Reduces all damage taken by a friendly target by 40% for 8 sec. Castable while stunned.
Shadow Word: Pain has a chance to empower your next Penance with Shadow, increasing its effectiveness by 30%.
Smite prevents the next 1,384 damage dealt by the enemy.

Pain Suppression gains an additional charge.

Power Word: Shield reduces the cooldown of Pain Suppression by 3 sec.
Mind Blast has a 100% chance to grant Power of the Dark Side and deals 20% additional damage.
Shadow Word: Pain Spreads to 2 nearby enemies when you cast Penance on the target.
When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed, you restore 0.5% of your maximum mana.

Ascend into the air and unleash a massive barrage of Penance bolts, causing 66,106 Holy damage to enemies or 96,013 healing to allies over 4.1 sec.

While ascended, gain a shield for 100% of your health. In addition, you are unaffected by knockbacks or crowd control effects.
Each Penance bolt extends the duration of Shadow Word: Pain on enemies hit by 1.5 sec.
Shadow Word: Pain deals 5% additional damage and spreads to 1 additional target when you cast Penance to its target.
Atonement reduces damage taken by 2%.
Mind Blast deals 150% increased damage, but costs 40% more mana.
Increases the damage of Shadow Word: Pain by 30% and increases its duration by 4 sec.
Shadow damage and healing done increased by 15%.
Immediately Power Word: Radiance your target at 150% effectiveness, and causes your next 2 casts of Power Word: Radiance to be instant cast with 40% reduced mana cost.
Atonement heals for 10% more when activated by Shadow spells.
Flash Heal, Power Word: Shield, Penance, and Power Word: Radiance have a 20% increased chance to critically heal.

Shadow Word: Pain damage has a chance to upgrade your next Flash Heal to Shadow Mend.

 Shadow Mend:
Wraps an ally in shadows which heal for 21,064, but at a price.

The ally will take 1,064 damage every 1 sec, until they have taken 10,579 total damage from all sources, or leave combat.

Shadow Word: Death has a 100% chance to summon a Shadowfiend for 5 sec when damaging targets below 20% health.

 Shadowfiend
Summons a Shadowfiend to attack your target for 5 sec.

Generates 0.1% mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Direct critical heals create a protective shield on the target, absorbing 30% of the amount healed. Lasts 15 sec.
Casting Power Word: Shield increases your Haste by 5% for 4 sec.
Shadow Word: Death deals damage 2 additional times at 15% effectiveness.

Penance, Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death cause your Shadowfiend, Mindbender, and Voidwraith to teleport behind your target, slashing up to 5 nearby enemies for 1,974 Shadow damage and extending their durations by 0.7 sec.
Power Word: Shield absorbs 20% additional damage and lasts 5 sec longer.
Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death consume 4 sec of Shadow Word: Pain, dealing damage equal to 300% of the amount consumed.
Entropic Rift slows enemies by up to 70%, increased the closer they are to its center.

Entropic Rift upgrades Smite into Void Blast while it is active.

Void Blast:
Sends a blast of cosmic void energy at the enemy, causing 3,583 Shadow damage.
Power Word: Shield absorbs 20% additional damage.
While Entropic Rift is active, your Atonement healing is increased by 20%.
Shadow Word: Death consumes absorb shields from your target, dealing 5,449 extra damage to them and granting you 1% mana if a shield was present.
Void Blast increases the duration of Entropic Rift by 1.0 sec, up to a maximum of 3 sec.

When Entropic Rift ends, a Voidwraith is summoned from the collapsed rift for 5 sec.

Voidwraith
Summon a Voidwraith that casts Void Flay from afar. Void Flay deals bonus damage to high health enemies, up to a maximum of 50% if they are full health.

Generates 0.5% Mana each time the Voidwraith attacks.
Shadow Word: Pain and Entropic Rift deal damage 25% more often.
While Entropic Rift is active, Atonement healing with Void Blast and Penance is 50% more effective.

Each time Penance damages or heals, Entropic Rift is empowered, increasing its damage and size by 10%.

After Entropic Rift ends it collapses, dealing 4,287 Shadow damage split amongst enemy targets within 15 yds.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Blast the target's mind for 11,949 Shadow damage. Costs a high amount of mana.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.
Increases your Intellect by 3%.
Lets out a psychic scream, causing all enemies within 8 yards to flee, disorienting them for 8 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.

Increases the damage and healing of your Holy and Shadow spells by 2%.
Increases your haste by 3%.
20% of Flash Heal healing on other targets also heals you.

Activating Fade removes all snare effects.

Atonement heals for 10% more when activated by Shadow spells.
Flash Heal, Power Word: Shield, Penance, and Power Word: Radiance have a 20% increased chance to critically heal.

Evangelism summons a Mindbender to attack a nearby target for 12 sec.

Generates 0.2% Mana each time the Mindbender attacks.

Shadow Word: Death has a 100% chance to summon a Shadowfiend for 5 sec when damaging targets below 20% health.

 Shadowfiend

Entropic Rift slows enemies by up to 70%, increased the closer they are to its center.
Power Word: Shield absorbs 20% additional damage.
While Entropic Rift is active, your Atonement healing is increased by 20%.
Shadow Word: Death consumes absorb shields from your target, dealing 5,279 extra damage to them and granting you 1% mana if a shield was present.

When Entropic Rift ends, a Voidwraith is summoned from the collapsed rift for 5 sec.

Voidwraith
Summon a Voidwraith that casts Void Flay from afar. Void Flay deals bonus damage to high health enemies, up to a maximum of 50% if they are full health.

Generates 0.5% Mana each time the Voidwraith attacks.
Voidheart now persists for 8 sec after Entropic Rift ends.
Shadow Word: Pain and Entropic Rift deal damage 25% more often.
Every 3 sec siphon an amount equal to 4% of your health from an ally within 40 yds if they are higher health than you.
Mind Blast deals 100% increased damage.

Each time Penance damages or heals, Entropic Rift is empowered, increasing its damage and size by 10%.

After Entropic Rift ends it collapses, dealing 4,287 Shadow damage split amongst enemy targets within 15 yds.

Step into the shadows when you cast Fade, avoiding all attacks and spells for 1 sec.

Interrupt effects are not affected by Phase Shift.
Your Spirit of Redemption is now an active ability with a 2 minute cooldown, but the duration is reduced by 9 sec and you will no longer enter Spirit of Redemption upon dying.

Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Consumes the enemy in Holy flames that cause 4,897 Holy damage and an additional 2,299 Holy damage over 7 sec.

Creates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands to a 46 yd radius, healing allies for 1,500 and dealing 2,105 Holy damage to enemies.

Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 590 Holy damage to enemies and up to 289 healing to allies within 13 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.

Increases your Intellect by 3%.

Increases maximum health by 25% for 10 sec, and instantly heals you for that amount.

Fade out, removing all your threat and reducing enemies' detection range against you for 10 sec.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.
Increases the damage of Smite by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal and Smite are reduced by 10%.
Activating Fade removes all snare effects.
Increases the healing of your spells by 3%.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.

Perform a miracle, healing an ally for 16,151.

Cooldown reduced by 6 sec when you cast Flash Heal.

Releases miraculous light at a target location, healing up to 5 allies within 10 yds for 4,676.

Cooldown reduced by 6 sec when you cast Prayer of Healing.

Calls upon a guardian spirit to watch over the friendly target for 10 sec, increasing healing received by 60%. If the target would die, the Spirit sacrifices itself and restores the target to 40% health.

Castable while stunned. Cannot save the target from massive damage.
Chastises the target for 5,662 Holy damage and incapacitates them for 4 sec.

After Spirit of Redemption expires, you will revive at up to 100% health, based on your healing done during Spirit of Redemption. After reviving, you cannot benefit from Spirit of Redemption for 10 min.
Holy Word: Chastise stuns the target for 4 sec and is not broken by damage.

Holy Word: Chastise causes your next 2 casts of Holy Fire to be instant, cost no mana, and incur no cooldown.

Refreshing Holy Fire on a target now extends its duration by 7 sec.
When Holy Word: Serenity or Holy Word: Sanctify finish their cooldown, you emit a burst of light that heals up to 5 injured targets within 46 yards for 1,106.
Increases the duration of Spirit of Redemption by 50% and the range of its spells by 50%.

Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity by 4 sec.

Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.

Increases the damage of Holy Fire by 30%.

Holy Fire deals 75% of its initial damage to all nearby enemies within 12 yards of your target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Heals all party or raid members within 46 yards for 25,025 over 3.4 sec. Each heal increases all targets' healing taken by 4% for 15 sec, stacking.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Your Prayer of Mending has a 12% chance to leave a Renew on each target it heals.

 Renew
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 5,761 over 15 sec.
Reduces the mana cost of Flash Heal by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Divine Hymn by 60 sec.
Prayer of Mending heals 4% more for each bounce remaining.
Your healing on allies with your Renew is increased by 10%.
Your healing spells critically strike for 220% of healing done instead of the usual 200%.
Reset the cooldown of your Holy Words, and enter a pure Holy form for 20 sec, increasing the cooldown reductions to your Holy Words by 200% and reducing their cost by 50%.
Prayer of Mending jumps 2 additional times.
Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify gain an additional charge.
Reduces the cooldown of your Holy Words by 15 sec.
Prayer of Mending has a 15% chance to not consume a charge when it jumps to a new target.

Increases the healing done by Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify by 25%.

Increases the radius of Holy Word: Sanctify by 30%.
Increases healing by 20% on friendly targets at or below 50% health.
Increases Prayer of Mending healing by 15%.

Holy Word: Serenity applies 12 sec of Renew to its target.

Holy Word: Sanctify applies 6 sec of Renew to allies it heals.

 Renew
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 4,608 over 12 sec.
Your Holy Words have a 25% chance to cause your next cast of Prayer of Mending to ignore its cooldown.

Power Word: Shield absorbs 30% additional damage.

All damage dealt by Penance, Smite and Holy Nova increased by 15%.
Increases the duration of Atonement by 4 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Power Word: Shield by 1.5 sec.
Flash Heal, Plea, and Power Word: Radiance healing increased by 15%.

Power Word: Shield casts apply 4 stacks of Prayer of Mending to your target.

 Prayer of Mending
Places a ward on an ally that heals them for 561 the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 4 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.
For 6 sec after casting Leap of Faith you may cast it a second time for free, ignoring its cooldown.
Pain Suppression reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.
The first bolt of each Penance cast damages or heals for 125% more.
15% of overhealing done is redistributed to up to 4 nearby injured allies.
3 additional Penance bolts are fired at an enemy within 46 yards when healing an ally with Penance, or fired at an ally within 46 yards when damaging an enemy with Penance.

Void Eruption sends out slow-moving bolts of Shadow energy at random locations every 0.5 sec for 3 sec, dealing 1,132 Shadow damage to all targets within 8 yds, and causing them to flee in Horror for 2 sec.
While Voidform is not active, being attacked will reduce the cooldown of Voidform by 3 sec.

Step into the shadows when you cast Fade, avoiding all attacks and spells for 1 sec.

Interrupt effects are not affected by Phase Shift.
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Blast the target's mind for 11,910 Shadow damage. Costs a high amount of mana.
Creates a ring of Shadow energy around you that quickly expands to a 46 yd radius, healing allies for 1,487 and dealing 2,118 Shadow damage to enemies. Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.
Increases your Intellect by 3%.
Lets out a psychic scream, causing all enemies within 8 yards to flee, disorienting them for 8 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost 50% less mana. Stacks to 2.
Increases your Stamina by 6%.

Controls a mind up to 1 level above yours for 30 sec while still controlling your own mind. Does not work versus Demonic, Mechanical, or Undead beings or players. This spell shares diminishing returns with other disorienting effects.
Reduces the cooldown of Leap of Faith by 30 sec.
Increases the damage and healing of your Holy and Shadow spells by 2%.

Channel a torrent of void energy into the target, dealing 18,457 Shadow damage over 3 sec and tearing open an Entropic Rift.

 Entropic Rift
Mind Blast tears open an Entropic Rift that follows the enemy for 8 sec. Enemies caught in its path suffer 586 Shadow damage every 0.4 sec while within its reach.

Generates 24 Insanity over the duration.

Activating Fade removes all snare effects.

Increases the range of most spells by 15%.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.

A word of madness haunts the target's mind, dealing 2,544 Shadow damage instantly plus an additional 11,104 Shadow damage over 6 sec. Heals you for 30% of damage dealt.

When reapplied to a target, all remaining damage is added to the new effect.

Does not apply to damage from Shadowy Apparitions, Shadow Word: Pain, and Vampiric Touch.
Vampiric Touch also applies Shadow Word: Pain to the target. Shadow Word: Pain lasts an additional 5 sec.

Summons a massive shadowy appendage to slam the ground, dealing 987 Shadow damage in front of you and 8 yds around your target.

Applies Vampiric Touch to up to 6 enemies, prioritizing ones without Vampiric Touch.

Generates 6 Insanity.

Increases Tentacle Slam damage by 300%.
Mind Flay damage increased by 15% and Insanity generation increased by 30%.

Bombards your target with a Void Volley and twists your Shadowform with void magic, increasing your spell damage by 20% for 20 sec. 

This spell is replaced with Void Volley while Voidform is active.

 Void Volley

Generates 10 Insanity.

Shadowy Apparition damage increased by 10%.

When Shadowy Apparitions deal damage, they extend the duration of your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch on the target by 1.0 sec.

Summoned minions last 20% longer and deal an additional 15% damage.
Reduces the Insanity cost of Shadow Word: Madness by 5.
